content: July 29 Express Scripts Holding Co  the largest pharmacy benefit manager in the United States  on Wednesday said the cost of potent new cholesterol drugs called PCSK9 inhibitors could "wreak financial havoc" among its clients.

title: Express Scripts says costly new cholesterol drugs could wreak havoc

content: NEW YORK U.S. authorities said on Friday that a unit of Express Scripts Holding Co will pay $60 million to resolve claims that it participated in a kickback scheme with Novartis AG to boost sales of a drug that led to improper government reimbursements.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: Express Scripts unit to pay $60 mln over Novartis kickbacks  US says

content: NEW YORK U.S. authorities said on Friday that a unit of Express Scripts Holding Co will pay $60 million to resolve claims that it participated in a kickback scheme with Novartis AG to boost sales of a drug that led to improper government reimbursements.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: Express Scripts unit to pay $60 mln over Novartis kickbacks  U.S. says

content: NEW YORK  May 1 U.S. authorities said on Friday that a unit of Express Scripts Holding Co will pay $60 million to resolve claims that it participated in a kickback scheme with Novartis AG to boost sales of a drug that led to improper government reimbursements.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: UPDATE 1-Express Scripts unit to pay $60 mln over Novartis kickbacks  US says

content: NEW YORK  May 1 A unit of pharmacy benefits manager Express Scripts Holding Co will pay $45 million to resolve U.S. claims it participated in a kickback scheme with Novartis AG to boost sales of a drug that led to improper government reimbursements.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: Express Scripts unit to pay $45 million to U.S. over Novartis kickback scheme

content: Pharmacy service provider Omnicare Inc  is getting buyout interest from potential buyers  including Express Scripts Holding Co  and CVS Health Corp   Bloomberg reported  citing people with knowledge of the matter.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: Omnicare draws buyout interest from CVS  Express Scripts: Bloomberg

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  April 29 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB' rating to Express  Scripts Holding Co.'s (NASDAQ: ESRX) new $7.5 billion bank facility. The Rating  Outlook is Stable. Proceeds will be used to refinance the current bank facility and to fund a $5.5  billion accelerated share repurchase program. ESRX repaid $1 billion of notes  that matured in February 2015 and is expected to repay $500 million of notes  maturing in September
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: Fitch Rates Express Scripts' New Bank Facility 'BBB'; No Rating Change on $5.5B ASR Program

content: April 30 Pharmacy service provider Omnicare Inc  is getting buyout interest from potential buyers  including Express Scripts Holding Co and CVS Health Corp  Bloomberg reported  citing people with knowledge of the matter.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: Omnicare draws buyout interest from CVS  Express Scripts - Bloomberg

content: Pharmacy benefit manager Express Scripts Holding Co  which has aggressively negotiated lower costs of new hepatitis C drugs  on Wednesday said a new "focus area" will be subduing costs of a growing wave of pricey biotech cancer drugs.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: Express Scripts says controlling cancer-drug costs a tough new focus

content: April 29 Pharmacy benefit manager Express Scripts Holding Co  which has aggressively negotiated lower costs of new hepatitis C drugs  on Wednesday said a new "focus area" will be subduing costs of a growing wave of pricey biotech cancer drugs.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: UPDATE 1-Express Scripts says controlling cancer-drug costs a tough new focus

content: March 30 Health insurer UnitedHealth Group Inc  agreed to buy Catamaran Corp  in a deal worth about $12.8 billion to boost its pharmacy benefit business as it competes with bigger rivals such as Express Scripts Holdings Co.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: UPDATE 4-UnitedHealth to buy pharmacy benefit firm Catamaran for $12.8 bln

content: NEW YORK  March 30 UnitedHealth Group Inc's  planned takeover of No. 4 U.S. pharmacy benefits provider Catamaran Corp will give the companies added heft in price talks with drug companies  serving as a catalyst for deals allowing other insurers to bulk up.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: UnitedHealth-Catamaran deal sets up healthcare M&A chessboard

content: March 30 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1400 GMT on Monday:
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Feb 17 CVS Health warned on Tuesday that the costs of a potent new class of cholesterol treatments could eclipse those of other expensive medicines and overwhelm the U.S. healthcare system "if rigid cost control mechanisms are not put in place."
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: UPDATE 2-CVS urges cost controls for new cholesterol drugs

content: Express Scripts  the largest U.S. pharmacy benefit manager  on Tuesday said cost savings on expensive cancer treatments could be achieved if the company were involved earlier in the decision-making process.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: Express Scripts sees opportunity to lower cancer treatment cost

content: Jan 13 Express Scripts  the largest U.S. pharmacy benefit manager  on Tuesday said cost savings on expensive cancer treatments could be achieved if the company were involved earlier in the decision-making process.
name: Express Scripts Holding Company
title: UPDATE 1-Express Scripts sees opportunity to lower cancer treatment cost
